description: This table extracts CC'd chart routing history information of the encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the CC'ed Charts associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CC_LIST_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The routing priority for the CC'd chart message.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


High


Routine


Low

columns.name: CC_LIST_SENTBY_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the message sender.

columns.name: CC_LIST_USER_ID
columns.description: This column displays the recipient user ID if appropriate.

columns.name: CC_LIST_POOL_ID
columns.description: This column displays the pool record ID for the recipient if appropriate.

columns.name: CC_LIST_POOL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: CC_LIST_CLASS_C
columns.description: This column displays the class recipient if appropriate.

columns.name: CC_LIST_ADHOC
columns.description: This column displays the ad-hoc recipient if appropriate.

columns.name: CC_LIST_EX_USER_ID
columns.description: This column displays the excluded user ID for the recipient if appropriate.
